title: Bug 10403 - Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
OB: Upon creating a new project, there is no confirmation or indication that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
EB: Expect the project creation process to include a confirmation or notification explicitly stating that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application and navigate to the 'New Project' section.
2. Fill in the necessary project details and proceed with project creation.
3. Observe the final screen or confirmation dialog for any indication regarding the scrubbing of the bin directory.
